DOC.brief_summary: In this study, the investigators will be developing and testing a mobile phone text message intervention to reduce alcohol use for people at risk of alcohol dependence. The investigators hypothesize that this intervention will be acceptable to participants, and that they will stay in the intervention until it's one week completion.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Mobile Phone Delivered Intervention to Reduce Alcohol Consumption
DOC.criteria: AUDIT score 1520 have a mobile phone capable of receiving text messages age <18 unable to consent language other than English or Spanish
